Cult of Manann
Manann's Faithless
The Matriarch of the Sea has travelled to the far corner of the world on a mysterious quest to do Manann's bidding and fuflill the Cult's destiny.

Camilla Dauphine is the Arch Priestess of the Cult of Manann, nicknamed the Matriarch of the Seas. Like the Cult of Sigmar Mannanâ€™s Cult actively seeks out to destroy those who oppose their Patron God. This plight has led Dauphine to the distant land of Khuresh, where she must hunt and destroy the avatar of Stromfel, the Red Chaos Whale. With limited supplies she must settle foreign ports to gain supplies from the Great City of Marienburg.
The Cult of Manann
Camille Dauphina, Matriach of the Sea
Sea Magicker||Battle Prayers of Manann

The Lore of the Sea is based around the manipulation and transformation of water. It is completely unrelated to the so-called Lore of the Deep, which has been rightfully banned as unholy magic of the evil Stromfel. Although not formally recognized as one of the major lores by Teclis, it is commonly taught at the Baron Henryk's academy in Marienburg.

[[img:hkrul_dauphine_how_they_play_1]][[col:yellow]]Conquer[[/col]][[col:green]] distant lands in the name of the Emperor to gain valuable reinforcements from [[/col]][[col:yellow]]the Empire[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:hkrul_dauphine_how_they_play_2]][[/img]] [[col:yellow]]Hunt[[/col]][[col:green]] the[[/col]][[col:yellow]] Red Chaos Whale[[/col]][[col:green]] who haunts the undiscovered seas of the far East[[/col]] \\n\\n[[img:hkrul_dauphine_how_they_play_3]][[/img]] [[col:yellow]]Rid[[/col]][[col:green]] the oceans of[[/col]][[col:yellow]] Rogue Pirate's[[/col]][[col:green]] by hunting them for powerful boons or persuading them to venture elsewhere using precious coin.[[/col]]

[[img:hkrul_fooger_how_they_play_2]][[col:green]]Send trade convoys across the world via the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_ivory_road]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_ivory_road}}]]Spice Route[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and navigate risks en route to reap great financial rewards.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:hkrul_fooger_how_they_play_1]][[/img]] [[col:yellow]]Recruit[[/col]][[col:green]] regular dwarf units as a bonus for completing[[/col]][[col:yellow]] caravan routes[[/col]]
